txt.en: Used the ballistae to goad Dargnákh into a rampage

You have come upon the cage of Dargnákh, the troll captured by the servants of the White Hand. Perhaps this may be used to your advantage as you seek to disrupt Saruman's war-efforts. Perhaps this may be used to your advantage as you seek to disrupt the operations in and around Isengard.
Used food to lure Dargnákh to escape and continue his rampage
Use the ballistae to goad Dargnákh into a rampage.
Drive Dargnákh from the outbuildings by setting him aflame with the torches on the walls.
Defeat Huva, an acolyte of Saruman.
Use food to lure Dargnákh to escape and continue his rampage.
Defeat Dargnákh the troll before he escapes into the wild.
Use the ballistae to goad Dargnákh into a rampage
Use the torches on the walls to set Dargnákh aflame and drive him from the outbuildings
Use food to lure Dargnákh to escape and continue his rampage
